sources.title: When You Are Gone | Full Movie | Haunting Thriller
sources.description:
When You Are Gone - James Taylor "Architect" struggles to live a normal life as his haunted past will not let him move on. He is constantly tormented by the ghost of his late wife, while also dealing with blackmail within his work environment.
2021.  Stars: Andrew Forner, Kelsie McDonald, Eduardo Aznar
